# groups()

**Instance Method**

Returns an array of all the groups in the Address Book database.

## Declaration

```swift
func groups() -> [Any]!
```

## Return Value

An array of all the groups in the Address Book database.

## Discussion

If the database doesn’t contain any groups, this method returns an empty array.

## Retrieving Groups and People

- **people()**: Returns an array of all the people in the Address Book database.

items.description: Returns an array of all the people in the Address Book database.
